All Known Implementing Classes:

  • Method Details

    • save

      Loan save(Loan loan)
      Save a new loan to the database
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to save
      Returns:
      the saved loan with generated ID

    • update

      Loan update(Loan loan)
      Update an existing loan
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to update
      Returns:
      the updated loan

    • findById

      Optional<Loan> findById(Integer loanId)
      Find a loan by ID
      Parameters:
      loanId - the loan ID
      Returns:
      Optional containing the loan if found

    • findAll

      List<Loan> findAll()
      Find all loans
      Returns:
      list of all loans

    • findByUserId

      List<Loan> findByUserId(Integer userId)
      Find loans by user ID
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      list of loans for the specified user

    • findByItemId

      List<Loan> findByItemId(Integer itemId)
      Find loans by item ID
      Parameters:
      itemId - the item ID
      Returns:
      list of loans for the specified item

    • findByStatus

      List<Loan> findByStatus(String status)
      Find loans by status
      Parameters:
      status - the loan status (e.g., ACTIVE, RETURNED, OVERDUE)
      Returns:
      list of loans with the specified status

    • findActiveByUserId

      List<Loan> findActiveByUserId(Integer userId)
      Find active loans by user ID
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      list of active loans for the specified user

    • findOverdueLoans

      List<Loan> findOverdueLoans(LocalDate currentDate)
      Find overdue loans (due date passed and status is ACTIVE)
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the current date
      Returns:
      list of overdue loans

    • findLoansDueSoon

      List<Loan> findLoansDueSoon(LocalDate currentDate, int daysAhead)
      Find loans due soon (within specified days)
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the current date
      daysAhead - number of days ahead to check
      Returns:
      list of loans due soon

    • deleteById

      boolean deleteById(Integer loanId)
      Delete a loan by ID
      Parameters:
      loanId - the loan ID
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully

    • countActiveByUserId

      int countActiveByUserId(Integer userId)
      Count active loans by user ID
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      number of active loans

    • updateStatus

      void updateStatus(Integer loanId, String status, LocalDate returnDate)
      Update loan status and return date
      Parameters:
      loanId - the loan ID
      status - the new status
      returnDate - the return date (can be null)
